session_summary: Jolene and Deborah caught up at 3:56 pm on 6 June, 2023. Jolene shared her completion of a tough engineering project last month. Deborah praised her hard work. Jolene expressed pride in overcoming challenges and reaching a milestone. She mentioned interning at an engineering firm and enjoying applying her skills. Deborah inquired about the impact of the internship, to which Jolene shared it inspired her to pursue her dreams. The conversation turned to work-life balance, with Jolene finding it challenging. Deborah suggested yoga for relaxation. Jolene mentioned her yoga routine and its positive impact. Deborah recommended mindful breathing during yoga. Jolene thanked her for the advice as they said their goodbyes.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a solar powered vehicle with a solar panel on the back
conversation_turns.text: Hey Deborah! Long time no talk - I had lots of stuff going on. Remember the tough engineering project? I finally wrapped that up last month. Look at the result!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Jolene! Congrats on wrapping up your with it! You really put in the work and it paid off.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I'm really proud of myself for sticking it out despite the problems and finishing it. It's definitely a big milestone.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Now that you've reached this big milestone, what do you have planned next?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a group of construction workers posing for a picture
conversation_turns.text: I'm interning at a well-known engineering firm. It's been a great opportunity to test my skills and gain real-world experience. These are my new colleagues!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: What's been the best part of it so far?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: The best part so far has been being able to apply what I learned in school to real projects. It's so fulfilling to see my ideas come to life.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Mind if I ask how the internship has impacted you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It has had a positive impact on my life. It has stoked my love of engineering and has encouraged me to keep striving for my dreams.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: How has it inspired you to keep striving for your dreams?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Hanging out with people who love what they do has really inspired me to stay focused and keep working towards my goals. It's shown me that with dedication and effort, anything is possible.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Have you been able to find a good work-life balance during your internship?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Honestly, finding that balance has been tough. I've been slogging away and it's been hard to make time for my hobbies and chilling out.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Have you considered taking some breaks and finding activities like yoga to help you relax and unwind? That might make a difference.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a man standing on a rock with his arms outstretched
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, I`m trying to do it. Here's an example of how I spent yesterday morning, yoga on top of mount Talkeetna.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Nice job, Jolene! How long have you been doing yoga and meditation? It looks like it's really helping you regroup and recharge.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I've been doing them sporadically for about 3 years now and they've had a real positive effect on me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Has it benefited you in any way? Have you found it helpful in difficult moments?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It has helped me with stress and kept me centered.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Glad they've been helpful for you!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: No idea how I would've survived without them!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a room with a bench and a window
conversation_turns.text: This is my favorite studio and it's always so calming.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I was wondering if you have any advice on calming the mind and breathing during yoga?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I'd recommend practicing mindful breathing for yoga. Set aside a few minutes each day to sit with your eyes closed, take deep breaths, and focus on how the air feels entering and leaving your body.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Deborah! I'll definitely give it a try. Appreciate the advice!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: If you need more tips or help, just let me know. Take care!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: See you!

Jolene visits Alask and practices yoga on top of Mt. Talkeetna
